delete_self_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete yourself?
delete_self_confirmation_description: You will be removed from the pulse and will no longer have access to it.
delete_member_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this member?
delete_member_confirmation_description: This member will be removed from the pulse and will no longer have access to it.
delete_pulse_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this pulse?
feed_up_to_date_message: You're all up to date. We'll keep you posted as soon as there's something new.
pulse_assistant_intro: This is your team pulse assistant.
personal_assistant_intro: This is your personal assistant pulse.
one_to_one_pulse_assistant_intro: This is your one-to-one pulse assistant.
pulse_onboarding_message: We’re excited to have you on board. Pulse is your smart assistant—here to help you stay organized, focused, and in control of your day from the very start.
pulse_description: It keeps you organised, focused, and in control of your day so you can work on what matters most.
pulse_quickstart_prompt: Not sure where to begin? Check out these quick links to help you jumpstart your day - or just chat away with Pulse for personalized guidance on what to tackle next.
pulse_next_step_prompt: Not sure what to do next? No worries - just tap a quick action below to get moving
pulse_create_first_task: Create your first task via the chat — start tracking what matters
pulse_chat_explore_prompt: Explore Pulse Chat — ask questions, get smart guidance, and stay in the loop
pulse_capabilities_prompt: What can you do with Pulse?
pulse_quick_overview_request: Pulse, can you give me a quick overview? I’d like to understand how you support my daily workflow—planning, prioritizing tasks, and contributing to your mission, if applicable.
pulse_daily_plan_request: What’s my plan today based on my meetings, active tasks, and unread DMs? Prioritize what needs my attention first. Include any actions tied to ongoing missions or objectives.
pulse_summary_request: Could you summarize what I missed while I was away—prioritizing key updates, any missed messages, tasks assigned to me, and mission-related activities?
pulse_creation_prompt: Create a pulse, or start with a template
guest_no_access_message: It looks like you're signed in as a guest and don't have permission to view this page. To get access, please reach out to your organization's admin — they'll get you sorted in no time!
manage_pulse_members_description: Invite or manage your pulse members
role_update_confirmation: Are you sure you want to update user role?
